text: Happy Death Day is a 2017 American black comedy slasher movie directed by Christopher Landon, and written by Scott Lobdell. It stars Jessica Rothe and Israel Broussard. The movie was produced by Jason Blum. It is about a college girl who is murdered on her birthday and begins to relive the day repeatedly, at which point she sets out to find the killer and stop her death. The movie was released on October 13, 2017, by Universal Pictures. A sequel, Happy Death Day 2U, was released on February 13, 2019. ==References== Category:2017 comedy movies Category:2017 horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies
title: Happy Death Day
